title: Call of Duty: WWII – Multiplayer + Nazi Zombies Add-on
body:
Call of Duty: WWII – Multiplayer + Nazi Zombies Add-on


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: Sledgehammer Games, Raven Software, Activision
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 26.9 GB
Repack Size: 19.6 GB

 

ATTENTION! This is an add-on for your current SP-only game installation. IT DOESN’T WORK WITHOUT SINGLEPLAYER FILES. You need my rip installed (any other rip also will do) and install this add-on to the same folder.

RELOADED Crack-only (SP/ZM/MP)

Works OK with all three modes w/o Steam needed, Tunngle and REVOLT’s VPN work too.

http://www14.zippyshare.com/v/sy8r3JiV/file.html
or
http://sendfile.su/1375748

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Steam version v1.3 (multiplayer/zombies depots only): 26.9 GB
  • Call.of.Duty.WWII.LAN.Fix-REVOLT crack applied over
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • You can install it over any SP-rip, not only over my SP-rip
  • Only multiplayer and zombie files included, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 26.9 to 19.6 GB)
  • Installation takes from 20 to 45 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: +27 GB to game installation (~32 GB during installation)
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

Game Description

Call of Duty® returns to its roots with Call of Duty®: WWII – a breathtaking experience that redefines World War II for a new gaming generation. Land in Normandy on D-Day and battle across Europe through iconic locations in history’s most monumental war. Experience classic Call of Duty combat, the bonds of camaraderie, and the unforgiving nature of war against a global power throwing the world into tyranny.

Call of Duty®: WWII creates the definitive World War II next generation experience across three different game modes: Campaign, Multiplayer, and Co-Operative. Featuring stunning visuals, the Campaign transports players to the European theater as they engage in an all-new Call of Duty® story set in iconic World War II battles. Multiplayer marks a return to original, boots-on-the ground Call of Duty gameplay. Authentic weapons and traditional run-and-gun action immerse you in a vast array of World War II-themed locations. The Co-Operative mode unleashes a new and original story in a standalone game experience full of unexpected, adrenaline-pumping moments.

  1. Install this addon to the same folder, where singleplayer game is installed
  2. Run it from desktop icon or from “Steam.exe” in game root (it’s not original “Steam.exe”, just the launcher
  3. Select game mode by clicking YES (for MP) or NO (for Zombies)
  4. After alert window, close your Steam application and run it again. Don’t worry, you need to do it once
  5. With Steam running in background, run the game again and you can play MP or Zombies with bots (use Local Game menu). For playing with real players via LAN, read instructions below
  6. Be advised to use some fake Steam account for this, just in case
Use any LAN-over-Internet software for LAN play, like Tunngle or Evolve.
